column4: hey all a friend of mine install ubuntu seems she now has to reinstall windows for what ever resion is there a program on ubuntu that can let her view her windows partions and let ubuntu mount it ???
yeah, Ubuntu can do that on its own, it just needs to 'see' the partitions, which it usually can by default
have you not used ubuntu before?
heh, I used to use Debian for years.  Still use it on a few systems. :)
I happen to think that Ubuntu has made strides where Debian can/will not make them. But, that is beside the point, and off-topic.
that it eh i dont use it graphicly either so im not sure how to guide her unless i just go to my sisters computer and work there :? or shh into her system and try to find it my self
well, if you want to help support her on it, perhaps install it in vmware or virtualbox
did she actually install windows yet?
I'm really not sure at this point. she might be able to get at it through Places->Computer... but if she has internet access, she might as well open xchat and get on here and ask herself
kim4249 is the one who having this issue
it's better to do it here, in case it helps someone else
or in case someone else has another option to help
